anl.verdi.area

Interface AreaFile


  • public interface AreaFile
    Encapsulates a set of data about an area file.
    Version:
    $Revision$ $Date$
    Author:
    Mary Ann Bitz

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String NULL_ALIAS 
      static int SINGLE_DATASET 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes this AreaFile.
      java.lang.String getAlias()
      Gets the alias of this AreaFile.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAreaNames()
      Gets the list of area names in this AreaFile.
      java.util.List<Area> getAreas()
      Gets the list of areas in this Area File.
      int getIndexInURL()
      Gets the index of this AreaFile inside its URL, or Dataset.SINGLE_DATASET if it is the only dataset inside the URL.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of this AreaFile.
      java.net.URL getURL()
      Gets the url of this AreaFile.
      void setAlias(java.lang.String alias)
      Sets the alias for this area file.

    • Method Detail

      • setAlias

        void setAlias(java.lang.String alias)
        Sets the alias for this area file.
        Parameters:
        alias - the alias for this area file.

      • getAlias

        java.lang.String getAlias()
        Gets the alias of this AreaFile. If no alias has been assigned the alias will be NULL_ALIAS.
        Returns:
        the alias of this AreaFile.

      • getAreaNames

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAreaNames()
        Gets the list of area names in this AreaFile.
        Returns:
        the list of area names in this area file.

      • getAreas

        java.util.List<Area> getAreas()
        Gets the list of areas in this Area File.
        Returns:
        the list of variables in this area file.

      • getURL

        java.net.URL getURL()
        Gets the url of this AreaFile.
        Returns:
        the url of this AreaFile.

      • getIndexInURL

        int getIndexInURL()
        Gets the index of this AreaFile inside its URL, or Dataset.SINGLE_DATASET if it is the only dataset inside the URL.
        Returns:
        the index of this Dataset inside its URL

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of this AreaFile.
        Returns:
        the name of this AreaFile.

      • close

        void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Closes this AreaFile. It will have to be recreated to be used again.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while closing the AreaFile
